title: Falling Walls Finalist 2020
desc: Our CEO Dr. Thomas Bartoschek was selected as a 2020 Falling Walls / Berlin Science Week Festival finalist in the Science Breakthroughs of the Year in the "Digital Education" category. https://falling-walls.com/remote2020/finalists/filters/digital-education

title: 1st place in the "Germany" category of the São Paulo Chamber of Foreign Trade
desc: re:edu won the 1st place in the "Germany" category of the São Paulo Chamber of Foreign Trade 2020 "Startups Connected" competition - as the science start-up with the greatest potential for the Brazilian market. Our Head of Education Björn Guntermann received the award in São Paulo and presented the senseBox on a tour through Brazil at many universities. https://www.linkedin.com/posts/dwih-sp_inovaaexaeto-cbai-startupconnected-activity-6585270172653768704-61yO/

title: 1st place at the Learntec Pecha Kucha Pitch
desc: At Learntec, an international trade fair about the digitalisation of the learning and working in schools, universities and professions, we convinced the jury in 2019 with our contribution to the Pecha Kucha pitch for EdTech start-ups and won the first place. http://www.lukas-forscherland.de/service/nachrichten/detailansicht/learntec-2019-virtual-reality-ki-und-frischer-start-up-wind.html

title: 2. place at the delina2019 Innovationaward for digital education
desc: At the delina Innovation Award for Digital Education, we achieved second place in the university category with our application. https://www.learntec.de/de/programm/rahmen-und-ausstellerprogramm/preisverleihungen/

title: Electronica 2019
desc: We were represented in the final of the Start-Up Pitch at Electronica, Electronics Fair and Conference, 2018 in Munich. https://www.elektormagazine.com/news/electronica-fast-forward-2018-the-startup-platform-pitch-schedule

title: Sybille Hahne Young Founder Award 2017
desc: At the Sybille Hahne Young Founder Award, we won the audience award with our concept for re:edu - project title at the time: senseBox/eduSense. https://www.uni-muenster.de/Ausgruendungen/preise/gp2017.html#anchor112

title: ERCIS Launch Pad 2017 - Bestes E-Commerce-Geschäftsmodell
desc: With our start-up project "eduSense" (now re:edu) and our motto "Full Stack Digital Education", we won the PayPal special prize for the best e-commerce business model and support from PayPal for our shop integration at the ERCIS Launchpad 2017. http://2017.ercis-launchpad.de/winners

title: CeBIT Innovation Award 2017
desc: With our start-up project "eduSense" (now re:edu) and our motto "Full Stack Digital Education", we won the PayPal special prize for the best e-commerce business model and support from PayPal for our shop integration at the ERCIS Launchpad 2017. http://2017.ercis-launchpad.de/winners
